title: Florence Pugh and Andrew Garfield on how food is used as a form of intimacy in 'We Live in Time'
description: Florence Pugh and Andrew Garfield discuss the ways that food is utilized in 'We Live in Time' and how Florence Pugh's culinary background was able to flourish in this film.
